column2: BRIEF-Louisiana-Pacific Says Reduced 2020 Capital Expenditure Plans By 50% March 30 (Reuters) - Louisiana-Pacific Corp: * REDUCED 2020 CAPITAL EXPENDITURE PLANS BY 50 % TO ROUGHLY $70 MLN FOR YEAR Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Louisiana-Pacific Says Capital Expenditures In 2018 Expected To Be About $200 Mln- $250 Mln May 7 (Reuters) - Louisiana-Pacific Corp: * LOUISIANA-PACIFIC SAYS CAPITAL EXPENDITURES IN 2018 EXPECTED TO BE ABOUT $200 MILLION - $250 MILLION * LOUISIANA-PACIFIC SAYS CAPITAL EXPENDITURES IN 2018 RELATED TO EXPANSIONS IN SIDING BUSINESS, GROWTH, MAINTENANCE PROJECTS AND SOUTH AMERICAN EXPANSION Source text: [bit.ly/2jyUZi9] Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Louisiana-Pacific Reports Q1 Adjusted Non-GAAP Earnings Per Share Of $0.63 From Continuing Operations May 7 (Reuters) - Louisiana-Pacific Corp: * Q1 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.63 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.68 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * “EXPECT STRENGTH IN HOUSING MARKET TO CONTINUE IN Q2 AND DEMAND FOR OUR PRODUCTS TO REMAIN ROBUST” * CONTINUE TO BE ON TRACK TO ACHIEVE TARGETED 12-14% FULL YEAR REVENUE GROWTH FOR SMARTSIDE * RECENT RAIL TRANSPORTATION SYSTEM ISSUES IN CANADA , INCREASED INVENTORY, LATE SHIPMENTS NEGATIVELY AFFECTED QTRLY RESULTS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Louisiana-Pacific Corp Invests $45 Mln In Off-Site Framing Manufacturer Entekratm May 7 (Reuters) - Louisiana-Pacific Corp: * LP INVESTS $45 MILLION IN OFF-SITE FRAMING MANUFACTURER ENTEKRATM Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
